comments.comment: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
Same issue here, when trying to compile LibCarla on its own. Installing libmsgpack-dev does not help. OS: Ubuntu 20.04
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/bernatx>@bernatx</denchmark-link> could you take a look at this? It seems to be an active problem.

Hi, That file is part of the RPC library. We have a forked RPC library, and that file is still there: <denchmark-code>https://github.com/carla-simulator/rpclib.git TAG: v2.2.1_c2 </denchmark-code>
You should have the file for example in carla\Build\rpclib-install\include\rpc\msgpack.hpp Regards
